awd_titl_txt: Acquisition of a Rapid Scan Fourier Transform Spectrometer
awd_abstract_narration: Support for a Rapid Scan Fourier Transform Spectrometer is                      requested.  They are requesting this equipment at this time                     because of the recent growth in the fields of semiconductor and                 superconductor science at the University of Maryland and                        throughout the world.  The FTS will be used for basic and applied               research in these two areas.  The work will range from materials                characterization to research on the fundamental Physics in these                materials.  A unifying theme will be the study of the basic                     physical processes in semiconductor heterostructures and high                   temperature superconductors.  Processes that relate to infrared                 electro-optical materials and devices will be emphasized.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
